casebody.data:
ORBAN
v.
PIKE CORPORATION, et al. No. 32A16-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Feb. 8, 2016. Scott M. Tyler, Charlotte, Attorney at Law, for Pike Corporation. Glenn E. Ketner, III, Charlotte, Attorney at Law, for Pike Corporation. David G. Schiller, Raleigh, Attorney at Law, for Orban, Michael. J. Daniel Albert, Attorney at Law, for Orban, Michael.

The following order has been entered on the motion to Dismiss Appeal filed on the 5th of February 2016 by Plaintiff:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 8th of February 2016."
